name: Silent Cause
description:
Short, story and exploration based, single-player horror where you are trying to find out what happened to family. While police found no cause from outside or from within family. While case has been closed it started drawing all sorts of people from ghost hunters to private investigators, you are one of them. Find what actually happened behind disappearance and sudden appearance of family by finding notes and clues that people left and try to uncover the mystery behind the murder while someone watching is coming closer and closer. Armed only with flashlight try to light up dark rooms that are long abandoned. It is up to you to end the story with knowing what actually happened or let questions stay unanswered.


STORY RICH

Uncover the story behind sudden disappearance of family and find clues that people left behind and make puzzling questions answered. Police found nothing so people like you go and try to find anything that could help with the case but they also found nothing, you will come here as any other but for you there is dark secret to uncover. Are you ready to handle truth?

ENVIROMENT RICH

Explore while you go after tracks of lost people while exploring rooms which are leading you their own way meanwhile you try to make way through them which is not always as straightfoward as it seems.


FIND CLUES
MAKE YOUR WAY THROUGH LOCKED ROOMS
UNCOVER MYSTERY
EXPLORE DIFFERENT SETS OF ROOMS AND STYLES
